CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Shadowfen relative to Sunstone Desert?
SRP.A: Shadowfen is {above} Sunstone Desert in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Peaks relative to Veridian Plains?
SRP.A: Crimson Peaks is {below} Veridian Plains in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverwood Forest relative to Azure Coast?
SRP.A: Silverwood Forest is {below} Azure Coast in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Coast}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Peaks}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sunstone Desert's minimum Housing Affordability Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sunstone Desert's minimum Housing Affordability Index is in {1998}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverwood Forest's minimum Housing Affordability Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverwood Forest's minimum Housing Affordability Index is in {2006}.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 2002 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in 2002 was {lower} than in 2009.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2007, did the total Housing Affordability Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1999 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total housing affordability index between 1997 and 2007 was {larger} than between 1999 and 2009.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 1998 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in 1998 was {higher} than in 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2004, was the average total Housing Affordability Index higher or lower than between 1997 and 1998?
NC.A: The average total housing affordability index between 1998 and 2004 was {higher} than between 1997 and 1998.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Azure Coast} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Sunstone Desert and Veridian Plains first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Sunstone Desert and Veridian Plains did not exchange leading positions.
